scripts.build: tsc && cp -r prisma dist/ && cp -r static dist/
scripts.start:with-migration: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prod:setup && npm start
scripts.render-start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=2048" SKIP_DB_SYNC=true node dist/src/server.js
scripts.render-diagnose-and-start: npm run render-diagnose && npm run render-start
scripts.render-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=2048" SKIP_DB_SYNC=true node dist/src/server.js & node scripts/keep-alive.js
scripts.start-render: npm run render-diagnose && npm run start-managed
scripts.db:init-and-seed: npm run db:reset && npm run seed
scripts.db:fresh: prisma migrate reset --force && npm run seed
scripts.dev:with-seed: npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.setup-and-dev: npm run db:prisma:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.prod:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run db:prisma:generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prod:seed:batch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BATCH_SIZE=5 BATCH_DELAY=2000 ts-node src/seed/seed.ts
